オプション1: The four gathered in Trapezoid Man's room.
"About this... I think it might be copper ore."
Star Man showed it to Trapezoid Man.
"I've seen it in a game. If you heat it, it becomes copper. In that game, anyway."
"If we burn this, will it turn into copper?"

"Probably not hot enough. A campfire won't cut it.
Maybe you could melt it with magic?"

"I feel like you build something like a chimney and blow air in from below.
I've seen a video like that."
"I might've seen that too. But we don't need it for building the boat, do we?"

"Not as a boat material, but it could help with processing wood.
And if we can make a pot, we might increase how many days we can survive at sea.
Also, right now I want weapons to move around the forest."
"I see. Right. Don't you make that kind of thing out of bronze?"
"I think so. Does anyone know the difference between bronze and copper?"
